tweet_text_element:
You can give prompts to Zomato customer support just like ChatGPT & it'll literally reply with an answer! 

They probably use AI before ticket escalation. 

This is so funny. 

I don't need a GPT 4 subscription now. 

Image credits: 
@KunalKSavita
